strapiPost.title: Green Cars
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas is getting serious about the goal for 50% of new U.S. vehicles to be electric by 2030. 

  • Environment friends: Rogers-based solar equipment provider Shine Solar made an agreement with Envirotech Vehicles Inc. allowing Shine Solar to start promoting and selling Envirotechâ€™s zero emission electric vehicles.
  • To infinity and beyond: With Shine Solar already providing financially and environmentally sustainable alternatives to power, the agreement with Envirotech Vehicles Inc. will tangibly expand the production of green energy in the U.S.

For more on the Shine Solar, Envirotech partnership, click HERE.
